objective: Conduct comprehensive project audit covering structure, git status, codebase, database, documentation, tests, and dependencies. Create versioned audit system for historical tracking.

implementationPlan.objective: Perform 8-phase comprehensive project audit and establish versioned audit system
steps: 1. Review project structure and monorepo organization
2. Check git status and uncommitted changes
10. Create versioned audit system with manifest

editHistory.reason: Comprehensive project audit covering 15 sections: executive summary, project structure, git status, API/web codebase, database, documentation, test coverage, dependencies, implementation alignment, metrics, action items, warnings, positive findings, next steps, and conclusion
Created new directory for versioned audit system to maintain historical audit records
First versioned audit report - baseline comprehensive audit documenting project health, critical findings (2), warnings (5), and positive findings (12)
Audit manifest tracking version history, metadata, metrics, and key findings. Provides structured audit history for future reference and comparison
Documentation for audit system including purpose, file structure, naming conventions, triggers, scope, process, report sections, integration with planning system, and maintenance procedures
Session history file documenting this audit session with complete edit history and findings

summary: Conducted comprehensive v1 baseline audit of OpenSlots MVP project. Analyzed project structure, git status (14 uncommitted files found), API/web codebase, database schema, documentation system, test coverage (0% - critical finding), dependencies, and implementation alignment. Created versioned audit system at claude-docs/audit/ with manifest tracking. Overall status: HEALTHY with high confidence. Critical findings: uncommitted session-02 changes and zero test coverage. Warnings: empty packages, duplicate prisma config, hardcoded API URL, no CI/CD. Positive findings: clean architecture, planning policy active, discovery flow functional, comprehensive documentation, modern tech stack.

criticalActionItems: Commit planning policy changes from session-02 (14 files)
Add test coverage for discovery module and timezone logic

notes: First comprehensive audit establishing baseline for project health
Created versioned audit system for historical tracking (claude-docs/audit/)
Audit manifest includes complete metadata and metrics for comparison
Planning policy (implemented in session-02) is now operational
Discovery flow implementation (session-01) fully functional with timezone awareness
Next audit recommended after bidding/booking implementation
Audit work itself captured in this session file per planning policy
